LanguageData.IvyFruitHigh.label: Ivy fruit high
LanguageData.IvyFruitHigh.description: Induces a state of happiness in the user. The euphoria it causes often induces smiling and giggling. Many soldiers who overdose die with a grin on their face.
LanguageData.IvyFruitTolerance.label: Ivy fruit tolerance
LanguageData.IvyFruitTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to ivy fruit. The more severe this tolerance is, the more ivy fruit it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.IvyFruitTolerance.stages.small.label: small
LanguageData.IvyFruitTolerance.stages.large.label: large
LanguageData.IvyFruitTolerance.stages.massive.label: massive
LanguageData.IvyFruitAddiction.label: Ivy fruit addiction
LanguageData.IvyFruitAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to ivy fruit. Long-term presence of ivy fruit has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug. \nWithout regular doses of ivy fruit, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.IvyFruitAddiction.stages.0.label: withdrawal
